body.name: VALITIC Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap Bars with Vitamin C, Retinol, Collagen, Turmeric - Original Japanese Complex Infused with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, Castile Olive Oil (3 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs
features: Dark Spot Corrector: Original Japanese Complex for Dark Spots Correction, our soap promotes a balanced, more even tone & a healthy glow; You can use this for your face, hands, neck, bikini area, inner thighs & underarms
Vitamin C, Retinol, and Collagen: As a combination, these can help your skin stay hydrated from the inside out with minimal sun damage, dark spots, and blemishes to get that smooth and glowing skin

Turmeric for Skin: Skin-benefiting qualities. Our soap is formulated with skin-cleansing turmeric which helps in restoring the moisture balance and reviving your skin from sunburns, fine lines, and wrinkles; Turmeric is also known to reduce scarring; This combination of uses may help your face clear up from acne breakouts
Rejuvenating, Exfoliating, and Nourishing Dark Spot Areas: Our soap contains Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, and Castile Olive Oil that penetrates, revitalizes your skin

SLS and Paraben-Free: Perfect for daily use! This turmeric soap can be used to clean most of the skin; First, wet your skin with warm water, apply the turmeric soap evenly on the skin; Then, massage for 20-30 seconds, and finally rinse with water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells really good like a citronella candle and lemon. I have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate my skin at all. I use this 2 times a day and already see my skin looking brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really does reduce dark spots on skin.
reviews.reviewText: This small bar lasts a long time and has a lovely scent. It really has reduced the dark patches on my skin that I've had for years. It does not irritate my sensitive skin, even when used daily with Vitamin C serum. So far, I love it and plan to continue using it as a permanent part of my skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but runs out quickly
reviews.reviewText: The VALITIC Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap Bars with Vitamin C did wonders for my skin, noticeably diminishing dark spots and improving overall skin tone. The added vitamin C seemed to enhance its effectiveness, leaving my skin feeling refreshed after each use. This is to be noted that it only happens over time, though.However, one drawback I found was their quick depletion. These bars seemed to run out faster than I anticipated, especially considering their price. While the results were impressive, the shorter lifespan of the product made it less economical compared to similar options I've used previously.Despite this, if you're looking for a quick and effective solution to tackle dark spots and uneven skin tone, these soap bars could be a solid choice. Just keep in mind that their shorter lifespan might affect the overall value for prolonged use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical buying this. But honestly after the first use I noticed a difference. I wish I took before and after pics!!! I used it on my elbows and knees first because these parts of my body have always been darker. Not anymore! Even skin tone. Then I started using it as a face wash, even skin tone on my face as well!!! I have noticed it has minimized the size of the pores on my face and I have not had a breakout since using this product. I was staring at this bar last night thinking “what the heck is in this!!!??” It definitely leaves your skin feeling tight so I follow up with a moisturizer. This is key I think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE HOW IT SMELLS
reviews.reviewText: I love how this soap smells and the consistency of it. It feels so rich and just makes me feel CLEAN after washing my face with it. Its a bit drying but its an amazing little bar of soap. The only downside that I see to this soap is that I feel like its not really removing any marks on my skin. Other than that, its great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works fine.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using it twice a day, in the morning and at night for the past two weeks and I have seen results. I can honestly say the brown spots on my face have reduced considerably no laser treatment will be necessary which is what I was going to do. It works little by little, you'll need patience, it doesn't work over night. Give it time and you will see the spots fade away. I truly think that in time they will dissapear completely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have very very sensitive skin and surprisingly it doesn’t sting or burn like some soaps do on my face. It also has almost completely made dark spots/freckles I had from the sun on my face disappear! 3 that are a little darker are still there but I’m thinking with more time using it they will all hopefully disappear. It also has lightened my arm pits pretty dramatically. After 7 pregnancies my skin darkened in the creases on my neck got darker. Now they have almost completely disappeared. I looked at my neck in the mirror one day and it took me by surprise how much longer it looked. I also did like another review said and cut it in smaller pieces so I don’t have the entire bar sitting in the shower. Think that helps it last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This really works, stay with it!Totally worth it!!I am a literal product junkie and have tried so many cleansers and serums and nothing has given me these results! My face is bright and dark spots from sun damage are almost gone! I no longer wear foundation or even a powder! My skin has never looked better and I am 59! My chest had some sun damage and it is disappearing before my eyes. I have been using it for months and every time I shower/wash my face it seems even better than before. I am a loyal customer for LIFE! I'm even starting a subscription, which I have never done before for anything. I wish I had taken before pics but had no idea that a little bar of soap could make such a difference. 100% recommend, but only to people I really love. LoL

It looks like the picture but to be honest it doesn’t work best on the face but on the rest of my body while using a body scrub tool it leaves my skin completely smooth then with oil it makes it even better.
